name: A Vinyl Story - HWG Jam Entry
name_original: A Vinyl Story - HWG Jam Entry
description:
A Vinyl Story

This is a jam entry for the HWG Housewarming Game Jam 2022! This entry took me about one month of very high energy effort, and now I'm completely wasted. 

You can use a controller or the keyboard. 

Keyboard Controls

  1. Arrow Keys
  2. Enter
  3. Escape

Music and SFX attribution are included as a .txt file in the zip. 

If you enjoy the game, or have any suggestions please let me know! I kind of liked this project and may turn this into a full release for Steam for like a dollar.

Cheers!
